articles.author: Trey Herr
articles.title: CISA’s security-by-design initiative is at risk: Here’s a path forward | TechCrunch
articles.description: Success with security-by-design is at risk, both from the political challenges of implementation and the threat of unrealistic expectations.

articles.author: Haje Jan Kamps
articles.title: If it hadn’t been for them meddlin’ kids | TechCrunch
articles.description: Welcome to Startups Weekly! From robots to AI generated porn, we have your startup news from the week right here.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Twitter, now X, opens up its ad revenue sharing program with global creators
articles.description: Earlier this month, Twitter — which has since rebranded as X — began sharing ad revenue with verified creators in an attempt to retain top talent on its platform. Today, the company announced its “Ads Revenue Sharing” program is now available for eligible cre…

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: NASA is launching its own streaming service later this year | TechCrunch
articles.description: The government agency announced that it's going launch a new streaming service later this year called NASA+.

articles.author: Haje Jan Kamps
articles.title: Sample Series B pitch deck: Unito's $20M deck | TechCrunch
articles.description: Here's how Unito, which offers users a unique way to connect their tools, raised $20 million in its Series B funding round.

articles.author: Natasha Lomas
articles.title: Worldcoin's official launch triggers swift privacy scrutiny in Europe | TechCrunch
articles.description: Worldcoin, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman's bid to sew up the market for verifying humanness only started its official global rollout this week but it's already landed on the radar of European data protection authorities.

articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Fan fiction writers rally fandoms against KOSA, the bill purporting to protect kids online | TechCrunch
articles.description: Fan fiction writers aren’t just penning alternate universe and steamy scenes. This week, they’re writing letters to their Senators.

articles.title: TechCrunch+ Roundup: SAFE founder survey, replacing a CEO, how cyber insurance works | TechCrunch
articles.description: Replacing a CEO is a complicated process: senior executives and board members should be in alignment, and founders must be ready to let go.

articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Google’s DeepMind team highlights new system for teaching robots novel tasks | TechCrunch
articles.description: Things that appear simple to humans have potentially infinite variables that we take for granted. Robots don’t have such luxuries.

articles.author: Lauren Simonds
articles.title: Startups, apply to the Space Domain Awareness Challenge Pitch-off at TC Disrupt 2023 | TechCrunch
articles.description: Does your space startup “dabble” in Space Domain Awareness? Then we want you to apply now to our elite pitch-off at TechCrunch Disrupt 2023!

articles.author: Alex Wilhelm
articles.title: Global web3 venture funding on pace to decline for seventh straight quarter | TechCrunch
articles.description: According to the Crunchbase Web3 Tracker, funding to crypto startups around the world is on pace to notch its seventh-consecutive quarterly decline.

articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.title: What makes everyone so sure SAFE rounds are founder-friendly?
articles.description: While SAFEs are generally considered founder friendly, when you get into the details it's less clear why they would be over priced rounds.

articles.title: Apple’s App Store tightens up on user privacy with new rules for app developers
articles.description: Apple for years has made user privacy a focus for its App Store with rules around data collection, plus requirements around app labeling, anti-tracking measures, and the more private “Sign in with Apple” option. Now, Apple will begin to require that developer…

articles.author: Haje Jan Kamps
articles.title: Podcast Script: The Dark Web | TechCrunch
articles.description: The dark web is a lot of things; user-friendly ain't one of them. The 'Dark Web Gift Shop,' tries to at least give you a little bit of a reward for your struggles

articles.title: Announcing the AI Stage agenda at TechCrunch Disrupt 2023 | TechCrunch
articles.description: AI is everywhere it seems, and you’ll find plenty of hot topics on the agenda for the new AI Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2023. Check it out!

articles.description: Listen here or wherever you get your podcasts. Hello and welcome back to Equity, a podcast about the business of startups, where we unpack the numbers and nuance behind the headlines. This is our Friday show, and we’re talking about the week’s biggest startup…

articles.title: Boys Club co-founders want crypto skeptics to see it as a tool, ‘not just a vehicle for finance or investments’
articles.description: Boys Club, a social DAO for the crypto curious, joined TechCrunch's Chain Reaction to talk about web3 trends and diversifying the industry.

articles.description: Determined AI takes on the heavy lifting of creating an effective MLOps practice and offers everything a company needs to operationalize machine learning.
